channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire - CONTAINED; INC#0500; 10:39AM; 400 W Solano Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r54xYc; Elysian Park; At 9:29AM LAFD responded to a reported brush fire in the area of Radio Hill. Firefighters located a small grass fire. While on scene, firefighters witnessed a male (age unknown) setting a fire. LAFD Arson (LAPD also responded) took the person into custody and are conducting a full investigation. There were no injuries reported and no structures damaged/threatened. No further details at this time. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR12 AR17 AR25 AR30 BC1 BC2 E1 E2 E201 E202 E203 E4 E44 E9 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H4 HA2 HA3 HA4 PH1 RA1 T1 T2 T3; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0247; 06:06AM; 1510 S Sycamore Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/430u2qQ; #MidCity; Firefighters responded to a single-family home to find a detached garage with fire showing. It took 35 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the flames. One adult male was found outside with burn injuries and Firefighter-Paramedics transported him to a local hospital. No firefighter injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E294 E58 E61 E68 EM18 RA58 RA61 RA68 RA861 T61 T94; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0781; 11:56AM; 99 Silver Spur Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pm3bYv; Bell Canyon; LAFD ground and air crews responded, with Ventura County Fire Department, to an injured hiker just outside of the city limits (Ventura County side of Bell Canyon area). A hiker sustained a long fall, and was hoisted/transported in critical condition to an area trauma center by LAFD Air Ops. Crews were unable to confirm reports of a second patient being taken to a hospital prior to first responders arriving. Nothing further.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC17 E105 E296 E305 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 RA105 RH114 T105 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0586; 11:00AM; 2232 N Beachwood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NOrAj2; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters responded to find only light smoke, but discovered that fire was well-established in the hidden wall space and attic, and spread throughout the ducting to multiple units. Firefighters ensured all occupants were out, and "chased down" all of the flame and hot structural materials in the building, most of which was not easily accessible. It took 48 firefighters 53 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish all fire within the two-story residential occupancy. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 CM52 E227 E229 E235 E29 E35 E52 E76 E82 EM14 RA76 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0586; 10:07AM; 2232 N Beachwood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NOrAj2; #HollywoodHills; Two-story townhome with fire on the second floor and in the attic. Offensive mode.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E229 E235 E29 E35 E52 E76 E82 EM14 RA76 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Chemical Investigation; INC#0501; 09:13AM; 15307 W Ventura Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PwiVmp; #ShermanOaks; Firefighters responded to complaints of an odor in a building and multiple patients with minor symptoms. A total of 6 patients had minor medical complaints (such as watery eyes, scratchy throat, etc.). One patient was transported and 5 others declined transport after a medical assessment by Paramedics. LAFD Hazardous Materials specialists are testing the atmosphere inside with air monitoring equipment. Initial readings are not showing any significant hazard, but the irritant has yet to be positively identified.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AP7 BC10 E287 E288 E83 E88 EM14 EM17 EM9 RA39 RA78 RA83 RA839 RA99 SQ87 T87 T88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1242; 06:12PM; 7527 N Lasaine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pvyc6T; Lake Balboa; KNOCKDOWN: 36 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes with no injuries reported. The seat of the fire was in an attached back patio and it extended into the attic and one room. The exposed, adjacent home was defended from damage. Primary and secondary of the home are clear. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E293 E90 RA100 RA90 T73 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1242; 05:53PM; 7527 N Lasaine Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pvyc6T; Lake Balboa; One story single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the back. Upon making fire attack, crews located fire on a back patio which is extending into the structure. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E103 E273 E290 E293 E90 RA100 RA90 T73 T90 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0956; 03:46PM; 1381 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bKIV96; Elysian Park; 48 firefighters contained the fire (51 mins) and held it to less than 2 acres with no injuries reported. The defended the radio tower (important infrastructure) from any damage. Crews will remain on scene for approximately two more hours for the mop up operations. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E220 E25 E290 E4 E44 E47 E55 E9 E90 EA1 EM11 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 HT3 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0956; 02:55PM; 1381 N Broadway; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bKIV96; Elysian Park; Approximately 1/2 light grass burning uphill (Radio Hill Gardens) with no wind.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E16 E2 E20 E201 E202 E203 E220 E290 E4 E44 E47 E55 E9 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 RA1 T1 T2 T20 T3 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart
